ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They are hatching up a plot,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed the disbelievers carry out their evil schemes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, they are but plotting a plot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely they will make a scheme,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! they plot a plot (against thee, O Muhammad)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily they are plotting a plot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed they are devising a stratagem,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: As for them, they are but plotting a scheme,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, they are but plotting a plot (against you O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, they are planning a plan,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [86:15] Indeed they, that is, the disbelievers, are devising a plot, they are preparing plots against the Prophet (s),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! They) i.e. the people of Mecca (plot a plot (against thee, Muhammad)) they scheme in their state of disbelief, that is to say they bar people from Muhammad (pbuh) and from the Qur'an; it is also said this means: they plan, in Dar al-Nadwah, to kill you, Muhammad!
